challenges.title: Advanced HTML and CSS Projects with Designs
description:
These projects will have you build a webpage based on an existing design.

After you finish each page you will read the page's original source code and compare it against your own.
You will be provided with the resources like text, fonts and images.

Your webpage should complete the design with the same look and feel as much as possible

It does not have to be exact, however, you do have the tools to make it identical.

challenges.title: Introduction to Visual Studio Code
description: It is recommended that you use Visual Studio Code for these projects.
Visual Studio Code is a source code editor developed by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS.
Please read the Getting Started guide starting with the tips and tricks section.

challenges.title: Interphase Webpage
description: The page must match the design as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use only HTML, CSS, Font Awesome, and the provided resources to complete this project.
Click to view full size image.
For all the assets need to build this site click here.
Buttons should be done with css NOT images.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.
